title: 8 - Cleft In Twain! (8.27.12)
description: Mayor Harmon grapples with fame and exposes The Family Feud; Comptroller Davis grapples with and exposes Harmon's shocking inability to tell jokes and the roleplaying Adventures of Sharpie and Quark begin.
lastTitle: 7 - Cranky Mayors, Pink Hairs and Shoelace Cares (8.20.12)
